alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Greeley; Howard; Nance; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 31 at 2:56AM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to five inches possible. Ice accumulations over one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...The highest chances for snow and ice impacts exist north and west of a line from Kearney to Fullerton, but it is possible that this extends farther south and east as well. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * WINDS...Northeast at 10 to 15 MPH with gusts to around 25 MPH. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Considerable uncertainty remains with the storm track and resulting impacts. It is possible that impacts extend further southward, but confidence in this occurring is lower.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Greeley; Howard; Nance; Sherman; Valley
